name: Space Codex (itch)
description:
Space Codex is a casual retro arcade minimal awesome top-down shooter featuring waves of enemy spaceships with different attacks in what is, literally, a bullet hell.

To beat them, you will have power-up options available through the map. The game only gets harder. How long can you stay alive?

Features:

- Beautiful retro pixel art

- Amazing chiptune soundtrack

- Different enemies

- Different power-ups

Music by:

Visager

sawsquarenoise

TeknoAXE
